data.name: title
data.description: The title of the component, which can be a string or a Snippet.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border radius of the component.

data.name: shadow
data.description: Specifies the shadow depth for the component.

data.name: topImage
data.type: Snippet | {class?: string, src?: string, alt?: string, [key: string]: unknown}
data.description: An optional top image, which can be a Snippet or an object with image properties.

data.name: bottomImage
data.type: Snippet | {class?: string, src?: string, alt?: string, [key: string]: unknown}
data.description: An optional bottom image, which can be a Snippet or an object with image properties.

data.name: contentClasses
data.description: CSS classes for styling the content area.

data.name: titleClasses
data.description: CSS classes for styling the title.

data.name: horizontal
data.description: If true, displays the component in a horizontal layout.
